ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, Yes, Yes.  I recently camped the dark circlet with a guild Brother and we picked up a necro wanting the circlet as well.  She was completely amazed at
ygData.messageBody:
--- Elijah Meeker <emeeker@...> wrote:

> The trick is
> education *laughs*
> letting the group know what you can do.


Yes, Yes, Yes. I recently camped the dark circlet
with a guild Brother and we picked up a necro wanting
the circlet as well. She was completely amazed at the
number of interupted spells Trazdon had when we
fought.
Hadn't thought about the resist songs but that is a
new item on my agenda now.
